title: Irelia's new model could use some work
body:
Irelia as a champ looked somewhat normal or proportional with her original model, but this new one looks off. She seems to stand almost a head above most champs in the videos that pre-release has shown us so far. But that isn't even the worse part. She runs awkwardly, it doesn't look smooth like her current incarnation, and her back, quite frankly, looks like it might have to be broken the way she stands. If the trailer for her is to be believed she is about the same size as swain, from all angles given. Her model just really needs to be slightly shrunk in my opinion, and just some basic changes to her models running stance pattern so she doesn't look so awkward.

The last two mild issues are the fact that her thighs are a little thick, though I can accept that as diversifying the roster. Her cape-like hair also seems a bit.... much and once again, makes her normal running animation awkward especially when compared to the smoothness of her current model.
